casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph Edwin BROMFIELD. No. 483P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jerry Wilson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of October 2008 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review Under 7A-31:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
